Title: Happy
Plot: Tommy's sister suddenly shows up in town when their dad is about to inherit a million dollars. Tommy and Janet decide to renew their wedding vows. Meanwhile, Mike is worried when he finds a lump.
Writer: Denis Leary, Peter Tolan, Evan  Reilly
GuestStars: Thomas Lyons,  Erik Jensen,  Alexie  Gilmore,  Ed Moran,  Tuck Milligan,  Cordelia  Reynolds,  Jamie  Morgan,  Richard Topol,  Doug  Moe,  Christine  Di Carlo,  Erik-Anders  Nilsson,  Niels Jorgensen,  Craig Wro
